sentences.en: ‘What are the chances for getting tickets now?’ ‘I guess I could give it a try .’
sentences.cn: “现在弄到票的希望有多大？”“我想我可以试一试。”

sentences.en: ‘You really think you can do that?’ ‘I’m going to have a try .’
sentences.cn: “你真的认为你行吗？”“我想试试。”

sentences.en: ‘You won't use a gun up here.’ ‘Try me.’.
sentences.cn: “我不准你在这个地方开枪。”“那你来试一试吧。”。

sentences.en: "I think I'll try a hypnotist," I said with sudden resolution.
sentences.cn: “我会找催眠师试试，”我突然坚决地说。

sentences.en: a chance to try your hand at the ancient art of drystone walling.
sentences.cn: 一次让你尝试古代干砌墙艺术的机会。

sentences.en: Don't try and double-cross me, Taylor, because I'll kill you.
sentences.cn: 别跟我耍花招，泰勒，要不我会杀了你。

sentences.en: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
sentences.cn: 努力过，失败过，没关系，屡战屡败，屡败屡战，每一次失败都比上一次更好。

sentences.en: he was &B{trying it on with} my wife.
sentences.cn: 他在勾引我的妻子。

sentences.en: he was &B{trying it on with} my wife.
sentences.cn: 他在勾引我的妻子。

sentences.en: he was trying the role for size.
sentences.cn: 他正在考虑这个角色是否合适。

sentences.en: I tried and tried (= kept making an effort ) and eventually I was offered a job.
sentences.cn: 我一次次地尝试，终于有人给了我一份工作。

sentences.en: I tried everything to lose weight with no success.
sentences.cn: 我试了各种方法减肥，但都没有成功。

sentences.en: I tried my hand at skiing.
sentences.cn: 我试着第一次滑冰

sentences.en: I try out new recipes on my daughter.
sentences.cn: 我按照新烹饪法做了些菜让女儿来品评。

sentences.en: I try to offend the least amount of people possible.
sentences.cn: 我尽量少得罪人。

sentences.en: I try to remember all the good times I've had here.
sentences.cn: 我试着回忆在这里度过的所有美好时光。

sentences.en: I'll try to save him the expense of a flight from Perth.
sentences.cn: 我会设法替他省下要从珀斯飞来的机票费用。

sentences.en: I'm always pleased to try out a new variety.
sentences.cn: 我一直乐于尝试新产品。

sentences.en: It might sound a ludicrous excuse but he thought it was worth a try .
sentences.cn: 这个借口也许听起来很荒唐，但他觉得可以试试看。

sentences.en: It's a constant struggle to try to keep them up to par.
sentences.cn: 要让他们达标，需要不断努力。

sentences.en: Let’s have a rest and then we’ll try again.
sentences.cn: 我们休息一下，然后再试。

sentences.en: She didn’t manage to break the record, but it was a good try.
sentences.cn: 她没能打破纪录，但这是一次很好的尝试。

sentences.en: The rabbis try to steer clear of political questions.
sentences.cn: 拉比们努力避开政治问题。

sentences.en: Try a hot bath with some relaxing bath oil.
sentences.cn: 用舒缓沐浴油洗个热水澡吧。

sentences.en: Try as he might (= as hard as he could ) , he could not get the incident out of his mind.
sentences.cn: 他想尽办法，但脑子里仍摆脱不掉那件事。

sentences.en: Try to eat at least four slices of bread a day.
sentences.cn: 每天尽量至少吃4片面包。

sentences.en: Try to get a feeling for the people who live here.
sentences.cn: 试着去理解在这片土地上生息的人们。

sentences.en: Try to look at this from my point of view.
sentences.cn: 试着从我的角度来看这件事。

sentences.en: Try to support each other when one of you is feeling down.
sentences.cn: 当有人觉得情绪低落时，要努力相互打气。

sentences.en: Try to view situations more objectively, especially with regard to work.
sentences.cn: 要尽量客观地分析情况，尤其是在工作上。

words.tran_cn: 难受的；难堪的；费劲的；令人厌烦的

phrases.phrase: I (或he等) will try anything once
phrases.tran_cn: ［用于表示愿意做新事情或体验新东西］我（或他等）随便什么都想试一试
[口语]争取(做某事)，竭力，尽力(做某事)[此短语不用于由tried或trying构成的各种动词形式]
(南非，史)（种族隔离时期）试图以使自己与白人（或黑人）社会同化来达到使自己被当作白人（或黑人）的目的
(英，非正式)试图欺骗，勾引某人
［用于表示自己可能会做出使人意想不到或不大可能的事情来］你来试试看吧
尝试做（从未做过的事），试身手
考验某人；试验某物，试用某物
尝试，试验（以确定是否合适）
试穿（衣、裙、裤、鞋等），试戴（帽、手套）
尽力做某事；努力做某事
尽你所能；尽你最大努力

trans.tran_cn: 尝试，努力，持球触地得分

trans.tran_en: to take action in order to do something that you may not be able to do

trans.tran_cn: 尝试，努力，争取，试用/做/验，审判
trans.tran_en: to take action in order to do something that you may not be able to do
to take action in order to do something that you may not be able to do
